title: PaymentMethodType
description: Defines how a payment is paid.

methodType.description: The manner is which a payment is made. E.g. Direct Deposit, Check, etc.

accountId.description: An account ID within a bank into which a payroll payment is deposited. The schemeID would include the word 'IBAN' or 'SWIFT' to reference the ID Type.

accountType.description: A bank account into which a payment is deposited.

nameOnAccount.description: The name of the person on the bank account

bankId.description: This is a number or identifier for a bank used in the context of electronic funds transfer. Usually, only a single BankID needs to be specified in the context of a given transaction. The bankId may have different names in different parts of the world. E.g. BIC in Europe, Routing Number in the US, and Sort Code in UK.

countryCode.description: The country code where the bank is located.

currencyCode.description: The currency of the payment to be made.
